name: Phrasio
description:
Thinking hats on! It’s time to tackle another type of challenge in Phrasio. Have you got the skills to beat this exciting word game and win? Put away your dictionary and let’s play Phrasio.

In this fun word and quote quiz, you’ll need to make a quote, proverb, line, or phrase from a set of letters. But that’s not the fun part. Next, you’ll have to guess just who it belongs to. It’ll be sooo much fun trying to figure out who it is.
